Transmission with OpenVPN.description: Docker container which runs Transmission torrent client with WebUI while connecting to OpenVPN by Haugene
Transmission with OpenVPN.more_info: Docker container which runs Transmission torrent client with WebUI while connecting to OpenVPN. It bundles certificates and configurations for several VPN providers. When using PIA as provider it will update Transmission hourly with assigned open port.

9091.description: Tranmission WebUI port. Suggested default: 9091. Remember to setup a NGINX reverse proxy to allow a WebUI connection to Transmission
9091.label: WebUI port

/data.description: Choose a Share where Transmission will save all of it's config and data files including your downloads. Eg: create a Share called transmission-data.
/data.label: Data

/downloads.description: Choose an additional share where Transmission can save your downloads. Eg: create a Share called transmission-downloads
/downloads.label: Downloads

LOCAL_NETWORK.description: Enter you local network and mask like 10.11.12.0/24
LOCAL_NETWORK.label: Local Network

OPENVPN_PROVIDER.description: Select the OpenVPN provider to use. Supported providers are PIA, BTGUARD, TIGER, FROOT, TORGUARD, NORDVPN, USENETSERVER, IPVANISH, ANONINE, HIDEME, PUREVPN, HIDEMYASS and PRIVATEVPN
OPENVPN_PROVIDER.label: OpenVPN Provider

OPENVPN_CONFIG.description: Enter the OpenVPN endpoint to connect to (e.g. Netherlands).
OPENVPN_CONFIG.label: OpenVPN config

OPENVPN_OPTS.description: Enter additional startup options you want to pass on to OpenVPN
OPENVPN_OPTS.label: OpenVPN startup options

TRANSMISSION_RATIO_LIMIT_ENABLED.description: Enter the transmission ratio limit status (true/false)
TRANSMISSION_RATIO_LIMIT_ENABLED.label: Transmission ratio limit status (true/false)

TRANSMISSION_SPEED_LIMIT_UP.description: Enter the transmission upload speed limit
TRANSMISSION_SPEED_LIMIT_UP.label: Transmission upload speed limit (1)

TRANSMISSION_SPEED_LIMIT_UP_ENABLED.description: Enter the transmission upload speed limit status (true/false)
TRANSMISSION_SPEED_LIMIT_UP_ENABLED.label: Transmission upload speed limit status (true/false)
